snippet: The government revoked the group’s ability to receive foreign donations as part of its crackdown on nongovernmental organizations.
abstract: Greenpeace India vows to continue its environmental campaigns after government revokes group's permission to accept foreign donations, latest move in crackdown on nongovernmental organizations.
lead_paragraph: The government revoked the group’s ability to receive foreign donations as part of its crackdown on nongovernmental organizations.

headline.main: Greenpeace India Says It Will Continue Environmental Campaign
headline.print_headline: Punished by Government, Greenpeace India Vows to Carry On
